alfredsnippet.snippet:
video_file="{clipboard}"

fps=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=avg_frame_rate -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$video_file")
# get fps
fps=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=avg_frame_rate -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$video_file")
fps_num=${fps%/*}
fps_den=${fps#*/}
fps=$(($fps_num / $fps_den))

# get codec
codec=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=codec_name -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$video_file")

# get resolution
width=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=width -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$video_file")
height=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=height -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$video_file")
resolution="$width""x$height"

# get bit_rate in bps
bit_rate=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=bit_rate -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$video_file")
# convert bit_rate to Mbps
bit_rate_mbps=$(echo "scale=2; $bit_rate / 1000000" | bc)

# show bitrate with unit Mbps
echo "bit_rate: $bit_rate_mbps Mbps"
echo "fps: $fps"
echo "codec: $codec" 
echo "resolution: $resolution"
alfredsnippet.name: Get info of Video(FPS, Codec)
